document.full_text: charlies davies scored two goal for d.c. united in its 3-1 victory over columbus on saturday night -- his first game since a car accident in october 2009 nearly cost him his life.
document.title: davies scores twice in d.c. united's opener
lines_and_colors: charlies davies scored two goal for d.c. united in its 3-1 victory over columbus on saturday night -- his first game since a car accident in october 2009 nearly cost him his life.
